questions.question: How to reserved a car here?
questions.answer: You can reserve a car by selecting your preferred vehicle from our fleet, choosing your rental dates, and completing the booking process through our secure online platform.

questions.question: How can i drop the rental car?
questions.answer: You can return your rental car at any of our designated drop-off locations. Simply follow the return instructions provided at the time of pickup.

questions.question: What happen if i crash the car?
questions.answer: In case of an accident, immediately contact our emergency hotline and local authorities. We provide comprehensive insurance coverage for such situations.

questions.question: How do I create an account?
questions.answer: Creating an account is simple. Click on the 'Sign Up' button, fill in your personal information, verify your email address, and you'll be ready to start booking cars.

questions.question: Can I modify my booking after confirmation?
questions.answer: Yes, you can modify your booking up to 24 hours before your scheduled pickup time. Log into your account and use the 'Modify Booking' option in your dashboard.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), debit cards, and digital payment methods like PayPal and Apple Pay for your convenience.

questions.question: How can i select a car rent?
questions.answer: Browse our extensive fleet online, filter by your preferences (size, features, price), and select the vehicle that best suits your needs.

questions.question: What if the website is not working properly?
questions.answer: If you experience technical issues, try clearing your browser cache, using a different browser, or contact our technical support team at support@royalcars.com for immediate assistance.

questions.question: How do I reset my password?
questions.answer: Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page, enter your email address, and follow the instructions sent to your email to reset your password securely.

questions.question: Is my personal information secure?
questions.answer: Yes, we use industry-standard SSL encryption and follow strict data protection protocols to ensure your personal and payment information is completely secure.

questions.question: Do you have a mobile app?
questions.answer: Yes, our mobile app is available for both iOS and Android devices. Download it from the App Store or Google Play Store for a better booking experience.

questions.question: How do I contact customer support?
questions.answer: You can reach our customer support team through live chat on our website, email at support@royalcars.com, or call our 24/7 helpline at 1-800-ROYAL-CARS.

questions.question: Do you have VIP access to airport?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer VIP airport pickup and drop-off services for premium customers. Contact our concierge team for arrangements.

questions.question: What happen if i crash the car?
questions.answer: In case of an accident, immediately contact our emergency hotline and local authorities. We provide comprehensive insurance coverage for such situations.
